Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 39th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1975...
Traded from Lynchburg to Gashouse on 2/25/1975 (Going to GHG: P J. Ramirez. Going to LYN: P V. Canabal)...
Earned first career win on 9/18/1978...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1981, going 5-0, 0.86...
Signed as a free agent by West Texas on 2/4/1984 to a 5-year deal worth $10,430,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1984, winning 2 games with a 0.52 ERA...
Injured on 6/21/1984 with a Sore Elbow, out for one week...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1984, going 4-1, 1.11...
Injured on 6/1/1985 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1985, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1985, going 5-0, 1.22...
